newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore, Cuba establish diplomatic relations.
newsitem.headline: Singapore, Cuba establish diplomatic relations.

text.p: Cuba and Singapore have agreed to establish diplomatic relations at an ambassadorial level, Singapore's Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Saturday.

"The government of the Republic of Singapore and the government of the Republic of Cuba, wishing to strengthen and develop friendly relations between them, have agreed to establish diplomatic relations between the two countries at ambassadorial level," a ministry statement said.
It said the decision took effect from Friday. The statement gave no other details and ministry officials were not immediately available for comment.
